data.actual_result: the black box is higher than expected and it looks like the text is kinda bigger
data.expected_result: the black box should be the same as if you just put one tick around the text
data.short_description: putting text in to a triple code block (three ticks) then editing into a one code block(one tick), the black bar surrounding the text is taller than it's supposed to be
data.steps_to_repro: - put text around a triple code block (I used test #1)- edit the message to where it has only one tick on each side- observe closely (best if you compare it to a message that is surrounded by one tick without it being edited, I used Test #2)
